title: Can the fking damage in this game be toned down? You destroyed the game
body:
It's fun getting instakilled by a 1/15 sup veigar

It's fun getting instakilled by a fking wukong

It's fun getting instakilled by a shen

Fking league of bad design choices

replies.body: What, you dont like it when the 2-16 "sup" brand with 1 completed item presses R and WE and gets a quadra kill in team fights?

> [{quoted}](name=Rexxiee,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5YYeKzEr,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-07-10T16:42:42.837+0000)
>
> What, you dont like it when the 2-16 "sup" brand with 1 completed item presses R and WE and gets a quadra kill in team fights?

Well ch'all shoulda been spread out with a brand on there team. Then at least you'll be picked off one by one :)

> It's fun getting instakilled by a shen

This didn't happen.
I see tanks insta kill all the time wdym?

> [{quoted}](name=JAYCCCCCCCCCCCCE,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5YYeKzEr,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-07-11T03:44:19.449+0000)
>
> I see tanks insta kill all the time wdym?

Not a fricking Shen.

That's ridiculous.

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Rhinark,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5YYeKzEr,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2018-07-11T06:29:20.329+0000)
>
> Not a fricking Shen.
> 
> That's ridiculous.

I've certainly had games where shens got a monstrous amount of dmg out potentially one shotting squishies along the way. It's mainly due to titanic hydra though.

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Rhinark,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5YYeKzEr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-10T13:18:02.794+0000)
>
> This didn't happen.

Shen with trinity, titanic hydra and ignite can do it. I've been close to instakilling with Shen without the ignite and using defensive runes.

you heavily underestimate what shen can do to a squishy if he gets a lead or builds more agressive
Or you just underestimate how broken titanics active actually is...

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Rhinark,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5YYeKzEr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-10T13:18:02.794+0000)
>
> This didn't happen.

Maybe it was URF
No, it wasn't in URF, it was in a normal game, had 80% hp, jumped on me and killed me in less than 2 seconds
E+Q into auto-{{item:3748}}-auto?
Probably still, for how tanky he was on that stage it's insane.
and? that takes less than a sec an CCs you for the time beeing
Full AP shen on URF instakilled him and he came to the Boards to cry maybe?

Burst Damage needs toning down.

Sustained damage is fine.

> [{quoted}](name=GripaAviara,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5YYeKzEr,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-07-10T11:34:23.324+0000) It's fun getting instakilled by a 1/15 sup veigar

support veigar makes me feel filthy & i'm stuck between banning brand/veig/zyra whenever i play support,,,,
Pick leona, obtain free wins.

> [{quoted}](name=Shakabrawl,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5YYeKzEr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-07-10T15:39:25.783+0000)
>
> support veigar makes me feel filthy & i'm stuck between banning brand/veig/zyra whenever i play support,,,,

Veigar atleast has some counterplay in him.
Id rather lane against veigar than those cancer broken champs known as Zyra and one shot mr flame.

> [{quoted}](name=CrestfallenNight,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5YYeKzEr,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-07-11T00:39:32.825+0000)
>
> Veigar atleast has some counterplay in him.
> Id rather lane against veigar than those cancer broken champs known as Zyra and one shot mr flame.

to be fair veigar his counterplay doesn't last forever, come late game it's Q + R and as a squishy you dead

> [{quoted}](name=hhaavviikk,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5YYeKzEr,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-07-11T16:03:36.398+0000) to be fair veigar his counterplay doesn't last forever, come late game it's Q + R and as a squishy you dead

^ this is what i mean. even if veigar can be shut down in early laning, he's still able to come back around by late game & one shot everyone :o/ shoddy game design imo

Patch 8.14 incoming... With even MORE damage :D

Absurd.
Play HOTS.
Yeah ..

> It's fun getting instakilled by a shen

???

> [{quoted}](name=GripaAviara,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5YYeKzEr,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-07-10T11:34:23.324+0000)
>
> It&#039;s fun getting instakilled by a 1/15 sup veigar
> 
> It&#039;s fun getting instakilled by a fking wukong
> 
> It&#039;s fun getting instakilled by a shen
> 
> Fking league of bad design choices

You were low, the ultimate is an execute, or the game was super late and you let him scale

Yes, that's what the champion is designed to do, you not building armour is on you

Ok, he's kinda broken

Supports are more like bootleg midlaners now. They earn a decent amount of gold even without CSing and only need to buy 1 support item before going full AP. Miss the days where they were mostly useful for their wards and auras.

Wukong being busted is an effect of keystones/runes reforged as well as duskblade & stormrazor. Majority of the damage creep is due to keystones starting all the way back in season 6.

Shen can't 1 shot unless he has 17 levels up on you and 6 deathcaps.
Maybe if you built a defensive item by level 18 you wouldnt get 1shot by a shen?
Maybe I'm not talking about lvl 18 ? I cant rush def items on an ADC for example, not without getting 0 damage and still get one shotted by other champs than shen

Shens not 1shotting you til he has either multiple AP items for whatever reason or a major TF build for whatever reason, which wont be til 18.

And if youre not building defensively, youre going to die fast. Thats the point of a glass cannon. Not much room to complain about it. Position better and play with team more.
Instaburst by a shen? Damn maybe you should press QWER or something
I was with you until the Shen, lol.

If a Shen is "insta killing" you then I just have to wonder how long it took you for you to still be lvl 1 when the Shen is lvl 18 with a full build. 

You can say that damage is too high but using insane exaggerations that can never happen is only goingto hhurt any argument you might have
